partnerDetails.about:
Mescon understands automation as well as the opportunities, challenges and complexities smart manufacturers face. Developments in automation technology and the IIoT are making it increasingly viable for businesses to embrace technologies that support internal and external connectivity, and we’re here to facilitate the transition and keep your control systems running and safe.

As system integrators, we provide solutions for the seamless integration of PLC, SCADA and MES to bridge the gaps between technologies, teams and areas of your plant site.

We bring our expertise in automation control systems engineering to
assist you in unlocking Industry 4.0 and moving your factory into the era of smart manufacturing and beyond.
